system.description: Need a burst of sugar rush but don’t want the action to stop? Grab a bag of Blastoid™ brand candy chunks! Choke down a bag of these patent-pending shards of pure energy! As a Bonus action, you can down a bag and gain the @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.Ej0fIoR2umnEbLfo.JournalEntryPage.h0qGxbscphm6gfV8]{Sugar Rush} condition until the next turn.
